entry.title: kamran1381/PWA-shop-: A lightweight, mobile-first Progressive Web App built with Vanilla JavaScript and Tailwind CSS. Features include a dynamic product slider, Instagram-style stories, and a fixed bottom navigation for a native-like experience. Designed with performance and smooth UX in mind – no frameworks, just clean modular code and PWA optimization.
entry.content: A lightweight, mobile-first Progressive Web App built with Vanilla JavaScript and Tailwind CSS. Features include a dynamic product slider, Instagram-style stories, and a fixed bottom navigation for a native-like experience. Designed with performance and smooth UX in mind – no frameworks, just clean modular code and PWA optimization.

entry.title: SeyZiiZ/Local-Dapp-TestNet: Lightweight complete Dapp wallet built with Solidity and powered by Hardhat, designed for testing smart contracts on a local blockchain environment. It includes seamless integration with MetaMask and supports multiple local wallets for a smooth development and testing workflow. Admin Panel, GPT Wrapper & more
entry.content: Lightweight complete Dapp wallet built with Solidity and powered by Hardhat, designed for testing smart contracts on a local blockchain environment. It includes seamless integration with MetaMask and supports multiple local wallets for a smooth development and testing workflow. Admin Panel, GPT Wrapper & more

entry.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
entry.content: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

entry.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
entry.content: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: AlphaIsYour/tokoeno: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
entry.content: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
